headline: Sify Infinit Spaces announces the appointment of Mark Adams as Non-Executive and Non-Independent Director on the Board
summary: CHENNAI, India, Sept. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Sify Infinit Spaces Limited (SISL), a subsidiary of Nasdaq listed Sify Technologies Limited (Nasdaq: Sify), today welcomed global data center technology advisor, consultant and practitioner, Mr. Mark Adams, to join the Board as Non-Executive and Non-Independent Director. Mr. Adams is a global strategy and M&A executive with decades of experience specializing in Communications Infrastructure and Technology across companies. Previousl

Mr. Adams is a global strategy and M&A executive with decades of experience specializing in Communications Infrastructure and Technology across companies. Previousl

headline: Asia Pacific Data Center Colocation Market Forecasts 2025-2030 | Smart Cities, IoT, and Industry 4.0 Investments Accelerate Growth with Equinix, Digital Realty, and NTT Communications Dominating
summary: The Asia Pacific (APAC) colocation market is set to expand from USD 20.788 billion in 2025 to USD 37.660 billion in 2030, driven by digital transformation, hyperscale cloud demand, and e-commerce growth. Major markets include Singapore, Japan, and India, with challenges such as high capital costs and regulatory complexity.
